article: One-day races and Classics , Grant Potter is an American road bicycle racer , from Florida. Potter was the Gold medalist of the 2010 Worlds Masters Stage Race, 2009 U.S. Masters National Champion, 2010 UCI Worlds top 5 finisher, 2010 Deutschlandsberg Worlds TT winner among many other titles.  , Grant is currently the team captain of the 2013 Team Graner-Stradalli . ,
